text: Aey rasool! Aap inn logon kay peechay na kurhiye jo kufur mein sabqat ker rahey hain khuwa woh inn (munfiqon) mein say hon jo zabani to eman ka dawa kertay hain lekin haqeeqatan unn kay dil ba eman nahi aur yahundiyon mein say kuch log aisay hain jo ghalat baaten sunnay kay aadi hain aur inn logon kay jasoos hain jo abb tak aap kay pass nahi aaye woh kalmaat kay asli moqay ko chor ker enhen mutaghayyur ker diya kertay hain kehtay hain kay agar tum yehi hukum diye jao to qabool ker lena aur agar yeh hukum na diye jao to alag thalag rehna aur jiss ka kharab kerna Allah ko manzoor ho to aap uss kay liye khudaee hidayat mein kissi cheez kay mukhtaar nahi. Allah Taalaa ka irada inn kay dilon ko pak kerney ka nahi inn kay liye duniya mein bhi bari zillat aur ruswaee hai aur aakhirat mein bhi inn kay liye bari sakht saza hai
